thread.title: 'Disturbia' director to helm 'XXX 3'
thread.title_full: 'Disturbia' director to helm 'XXX 3' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 'Disturbia' director to helm 'XXX 3'
text:
The third installment of "XXX" movie series, "XXX: The Return of Xander Cage", which has been in development for years, is about to move forward with DJ Caruso as the director.
READ: Accident on''xXx'' set made Vin Diesel serious about stunts
The director of Disturbia , would helm the film, starring Vin Diesel, reported Ace Showbiz.
"I'm excited as hell about 'XXX'. DJ Caruso is directing it, which is exciting," Diesel said.
With Fast and Furious 8 slated to be released on April 14, 2017, Diesel was unsure if XXX 3 would start filming before the car-racing sequel.
"The big question now is which will race to production first now that F Gary Gray is on ( Furious 8 )? Will XXX race to production first or will Fast race to production first?" Diesel said.
